items.badge_description: No matter what's in your pint glass today, we want to wish you a Happy St. Patrick's Day. May the luck of the Irish be with you!

items.badge_name: Cheers to Independent U.S. Craft Breweries (Level 15)
items.badge_description: Cheers, beer patriot! You are supporting the small and independent American craft brewer. When you see the seal -- shaped like an upside-down beer bottle -- that's independence you're tasting. Try 5 more to earn Level 16!

Round and round the wheel goes! Which style you’ll be drinking, nobody knows! Your desire to explore different styles is inspiring. Keep it up! That's a check-in to at least 55 different styles. Try 5 more for Level 12!

items.checkin_comment: The rye is a good compliment to the juiciness of the hops.

items.badge_description: You’ve pledged allegiance, and now it’s time to enjoy some beer! Now remember, not all American beer is fizzy and yellow. That’s 110 different beers from a brewery in the United States. Try 5 more for Level 23.

Looking for more kick than a session beer, but want to be able to stay for a few rounds? You have to keep it in the middle. That's 65 beers with an ABV greater than 5% and less than 10%. Try 5 more for Level 14!

Right about now you’re feeling your face tighten and your taste buds explode. The full pucker is quickly setting in and you can’t get enough. This is the wonder of the sour. That's 15 different Sour Beers. Try 5 more for Level 4.
Happy International Women’s Day! Let’s raise a glass to all of the amazing women in the beer industry. Cheers to you and we look forward to celebrating with you in the years to come!

items.badge_name: Cheers to Independent U.S. Craft Breweries (Level 14)
items.badge_description: Cheers, beer patriot! You are supporting the small and independent American craft brewer. When you see the seal -- shaped like an upside-down beer bottle -- that's independence you're tasting. Try 5 more to earn Level 15!
Your quest to quench your thirst leaves no stone unturned! That's at least 45 distinct venues!

Fresh from the tap is one of the best ways to enjoy a beer. Just try to use a glass and not drink directly from the tap, as tempting as it may be. That's 70 checkins with the serving style of Draft. Try 5 more for Level 15!

It’s been a long day and now it’s time for a reward. Crisp, tasty and refreshing, enjoy that delicious fruit beer! That's 10 different beers with the style of Fruit Beer or Sour - Fruited. Try 5 more for Level 3.

While spontaneity can be fun, sometimes you want to make sure your adventure will rock. Checkout the menu at an Untappd Verified Venue before visiting and know exactly what’s on tap! That's 60 check-ins at venue that is verified. Try 5 more for Level 13!

There's beer in them thar hills! You're setting off on your journey through the world of beer, but be sure to take a little time to get to know each brewery as you go. That's a beer from 55 different breweries. Try 5 more for Level 12!

items.checkin_comment: The 2018 Maryland Comptroller's cup overall runner up (2nd place). They definently made sure the coffee was front and center for this one.

#JanuQuenchy is back! We want to shed some holiday pounds but we don’t want to give up drinking really good beer. Enter SeaQuench Ale, the award-winning low-calorie beer that happens to be the most thirst-quenching beer Dogfish has ever brewed. This month join founder Sam Calagione and the Dogfish crew as we resolve to eat sensibly, do something active, and commit to SeaQuench Ale being the only beer we drink all month. Check out our blog for some encouragement from Sam!
